```{r setup}
library(fastCNVdata)
library(Seurat)
```
This is a data package, it contains scRNAseq and spatial transcriptomics data from different tissues, all of them in Seurat objects. 
To load the scRNAseq data : 
```{r sc}
utils::data(scBreast)
utils::data(scColon)

```
To load the Spatial Transcriptomics data  : 
```{r st}
utils::data(crcsample1)
utils::data(crcsample2)
utils::data(crcsample3)
utils::data(crcsample4)
```
